name: Lumbar Spinal Stenosis Bolster
descr:
This Lumbar Spinal Stenosis Bolster can be used when delivering the Lumbar Spinal Stenosis Treatment Protocol by Dr. Carlo Ammendolia. 

The aim of the Bolster is to maintain lumbar flexion when performing various manual therapy techniques outlined in the Treatment Protocol for Health Care Practitioners. 

The Lumbar Spinal Stenosis Bolster can also be used to perform some of the exercises outlined in the Lumbar Spinal Stenosis Workbook and instructional DVD. 
 
The upholstery is made of 50% PVC and 50% Polyester.

Before using the Lumbar Spinal Stenosis Bolster consult your Health Care Practitioner to ensure it is appropriate for you.

For thorough instructions on how to properly use the Lumbar Spinal Stenosis Bolster, please watch this video below.
